Container.Overview:
RomM (ROM Manager) is a game library manager focused on retro gaming. It enables you to efficiently manage and organize all your games from a web browser.
Inspired by Jellyfin, RomM allows you to handle all your games through a modern interface while enhancing them with IGDB metadata.
NOTE: Please copy the file at https://github.com/zurdi15/romm/blob/release/examples/config.example.yml to your /mnt/user/appdata/romm (or equivalent) folder as 'config.yml' You can configure the application settings using the file /romm/config.yml
NOTE: You will need to create an IGDB 'Client ID' and 'Client Secret' from the Twitch Dev API as descibed here: https://api-docs.igdb.com/#getting-started
Additional features can be activated, see here: https://github.com/zurdi15/romm/blob/release/examples/docker-compose.example.yml
